title: Fallen from Grace
description:
He's a dark Angel sworn to protect and defend, forbidden to touch the only temptation he's had in centuries. She's a human girl whose light and pure soul has become a target for the forces of darkness. They must fight a battle not only for her soul but of the heart. Can she be saved in time?Bash and Emily must cheat death and find a way to stay together in a world torn apart in an epic fight between good and evil. The battleground of the soul takes precedence over everything, but is it stronger than true love? Sacrifice always demands a price. Who will pay the cost?
One dark angel, a human girl, and an eternal battle over the soul...
author: Nikki Landis
